content: This looks great! It is similar to the “Show More” approach listed above. Two things to consider: Move the second icon to the far right, since that basically contains the secondary actions.Add labels that describe the actions, something simple, like: Newsfeed, Search, Profile and More. But above all, test things to see what works best with your audience. PS. Feel free to reach out regarding Mobiscroll. Would be happy to check if we can help.
